<h3 id="X39901">X(39901) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: OUTER-YFF TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^6-(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4+(b^4+c^4+2*(b^2-b*c+c^2)*b*c)*a^2-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39901) = 3*X(10072)-2*X(12589)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39901) lies on these lines: {1,6776}, {3,39897}, {5,39891}, {6,1478}, {11,18440}, {12,5050}, {35,25406}, {36,69}, {46,5847}, {56,3564}, {182,498}, {193,4293}, {388,14912}, {496,39892}, {497,39874}, {499,1352}, {511,4299}, {542,10069}, {611,8550}, {613,1479}, {895,18968}, {999,39873}, {1351,7354}, {1353,18990}, {1469,4317}, {1570,9651}, {1737,39885}, {2330,10056}, {3056,4302}, {3086,5921}, {3299,39876}, {3301,39875}, {3582,11180}, {3585,14853}, {3618,7951}, {4311,34379}, {5028,9597}, {5034,9596}, {5093,9655}, {5261,33748}, {5272,14826}, {5322,6515}, {5432,12017}, {5848,10074}, {5849,36741}, {7280,10519}, {8540,31670}, {10046,39879}, {10047,39882}, {10048,39887}, {10049,39888}, {10063,13354}, {10523,39890}, {10802,39872}, {10895,18583}, {10896,39884}, {10948,39889}, {11061,19470}, {11392,39588}, {11399,39871}, {11508,39877}, {11579,32243}, {11879,39880}, {11880,39881}, {11913,39886}, {11953,39895}, {11954,39896}, {12047,16475}, {12940,34779}, {12943,21850}, {13905,19145}, {13963,19146}, {15326,33878}, {22767,39883}, {35768,39894}, {35769,39893}, {37692,38049}</p>
<p>
X(39901) = midpoint of X(6776) and X(39903)<br>
X(39901) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1479, 613), (39892, 496)<br>
X(39901) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 6776, 39900), (182, 12588, 498), (999, 39899, 39873), (1352, 1428, 499)<br>
</p>
